article.Heading: Watch: Time 'Make in India' Awards
article.Summary: CNBC-TV18 special brings you the winners of Time 'Make in India' Awards. Eminent panellists in discussion are Yogesh Agarwal, Managing Director of Ajanta Pharma, Rajesh Agarwal, Joint Managing Director of Ajanta Pharma, Shankar Narayanan, Managing Director of Carlyle in India; Norman Pearlstine, the Chief Content Officer at Time Inc.
article.Body:
CNBC-TV18 special brings you the winners of Time 'Make in India' Awards. Eminent panellists in discussion are Yogesh Agarwal, Managing Director of Ajanta Pharma; Rajesh Agarwal, Joint Managing Director of Ajanta Pharma; Shankar Narayanan, Managing Director of Carlyle in India; Norman Pearlstine, the Chief Content Officer at Time Inc.

For entire discussion, watch accompanying videos...
